newsitem.title: USA: Tandem, CA in software cross-licensing pact.
newsitem.headline: Tandem, CA in software cross-licensing pact.

text.p: Tandem Computers Inc and Computer Associates International Inc have reached a joint development and cross-licensing agreement.

The companies also announced they will jointly deliver a cluster-aware version of CA-Unicenter for the management of Tandem and other clustered environments, including Windows NT, UNIX and Tandem Himalaya servers. Tandem will standardize on CA-Unicenter for all its server platforms.
Under the pact, Tandem will standardize on CA-Unicenter for all Tandem and Tandem-enabled cluster systems, including the Microsoft Windows NT Server platform and parallel processing Himalaya systems.
